TextBody:
Hi Sumyan,

The server was received as an AMI and was installed on your AWS by the representative of your company.
As for how the SumoLogic agent was installed I will have to check internally and get back to you, since regularly, customers do not receive SSH access unless they sign a waiver.
I will get back to you next week after I inquire.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

Endpoint Protector now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd
www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
Hi Sumyan,

I apologize it taking this long, but I am trying to find someone who can tell me if your company initiated an SSH access procedure, and I do not have an answer yet.
If you have checks to make in the back-end of the server and you know where to look, we can set up a remote session and I will access the back-end and look together.
If you can wait until I manage to get an answer, we can take it from there and see how to best handle it.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer
